about_the_game:
PLATINUM SKIN by Royal Bengal Armory

Experience the epitome of sophistication and elegance with the Platinum Skin by Royal Bengal Armory. Created by a renowned gunsmith company specializing in custom works, this skin embodies exclusivity and refinement. The Platinum material, adorned with blue gemstones, exudes a sense of elite craftsmanship. Each piece features a precision-crafted triangular pattern, designed with meticulous attention to detail using cutting-edge CnC technology. Enhance and give individuality to your weapon with this cosmetic DLC, elevating it to a level of unmatched prestige and style.

This skin can be applied to all available weapons in the game. To give you a better idea of how it will appear on your preferred weapons, you can preview these aesthetics within the in-game weapon customization menu.

All skin brands are a fictional part of Zero Hour and does not represent any real or existing entities. Any resemblance to actual brands is purely coincidental. The purpose of using fictional brand names is solely for creative and illustrative purposes.
